meta.title: NARA Digital Marketplace
meta.description: Purchase NARA publications, maps, laboratory services, and research products online.
meta.keywords: marketplace, publications, lab services, NARA products

hero.title: NARA Digital Marketplace
hero.subtitle: Research data, software tools, online courses and digital resources.
hero.highlight: Empowering marine research through digital innovation.

quality.title: Quality Guaranteed
quality.description: All products certified and approved by NARA experts

bathymetry-dataset.name: Sri Lanka EEZ Bathymetry Dataset
bathymetry-dataset.description: High-resolution bathymetric data for Sri Lankan waters, GeoTIFF format, 10m resolution

ocean-temp-data.name: Historical Ocean Temperature Data
ocean-temp-data.description: 20-year SST dataset (2005-2025), CSV/NetCDF formats, daily measurements

marine-biodiversity-report.name: Sri Lankan Marine Biodiversity Report 2025
marine-biodiversity-report.description: Comprehensive 200-page PDF report on marine species, habitats, and conservation status

fisheries-statistics.name: Annual Fisheries Statistical Yearbook
fisheries-statistics.description: Complete fisheries data: catch statistics, vessel registrations, export data (PDF + Excel)

gis-marine-mapping.name: NARA Marine GIS Toolkit
gis-marine-mapping.description: Desktop GIS software for marine spatial planning, includes 50+ map layers

fish-id-app.name: Fish Species Identification App
fish-id-app.description: Mobile app with AI-powered fish identification, 500+ Sri Lankan species database

oceanography-course.name: Introduction to Oceanography (Online)
oceanography-course.description: 12-week self-paced course, video lectures, quizzes, certificate upon completion

marine-gis-course.name: Marine GIS & Spatial Analysis Course
marine-gis-course.description: 8-week hands-on course, live webinars, project-based learning

ocean-data-api.name: Real-Time Ocean Data API Access
ocean-data-api.description: RESTful API for SST, salinity, currents, wave height - 10,000 requests/month

satellite-imagery-sub.name: Satellite Imagery Subscription
satellite-imagery-sub.description: Weekly updated satellite images: ocean color, chlorophyll-a, sea surface height

marine-weather-api.name: Marine Weather Forecast API
marine-weather-api.description: 7-day marine forecasts, wave predictions, wind data - 5,000 API calls/month

research-database-access.name: NARA Research Database Premium Access
research-database-access.description: Unlimited access to 10,000+ research papers, datasets, and technical reports
